div.div: Widener University vs. Delaware Valley Coll
at Doylestown, PA | James Work Memorial

tr.td: Widener wins the toss and defers to second half, DVC to receive
James McFadden kickoff 61 yards to the DVC9, Isaiah Hall return 0 yards to the DVC9 (Martin Turner).
Aaron Wilmer pass complete to Chris Ruiz for 29 yards to the DVC38, 1ST DOWN DVC (Chad Gravinese).
Aaron Wilmer rush for 1 yard to the DVC39 (Dylan Ditmer).
Kyle Schuberth rush for 5 yards to the DVC44 (John Philpott).
Aaron Wilmer sacked for loss of 7 yards to the DVC37 (J.Wojceichowski).
Brandon Snyder punt 22 yards to the WID41, downed.
Chris Haupt pass complete to C. Imbalzano for 8 yards to the WID49 (T. Osborne).
Chris Haupt pass incomplete to Anthony Davis, dropped pass.
